title: Bug: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When working with binary projects in the org.apache.ant package, I encountered an issue where the scoped type hierarchy was not available. I am unsure about the cause and meaning of the error message received.
OB: When trying to view the type hierarchy for binary projects in the org.apache.ant package (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, Can you please clarify the meaning of this error message?
